body:
So, I will get to the point, I need someone to help me with a texture pack issue. So I have been trying to put a 3d model I have into the game, but it just comes up as a square with purple and black squares. If anyone would be willing to help, can I sent you a json file and you would create the pack? It would only be that one specific model. IF you want to help contact me on skype:

My Skype:
Running_Boy_12


Thank You,
{tag=2c4acdd477d7466fbdb62994f09c4d2d}

title: I Need Texture Pack Help

replies.body:
It's supposed to be a .png file.

What texture are you editing? Tell me the ingame name and the the name in the resource pack folder (ex. Diamond Sword=diamond_sword).

Is the texture animated?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: For a 3D model it's a Json. I have done it before but this one is being problematic. I'm really looking to replace a blocks shape and texture. Maybe clay.
